com.decoded.zool

Class ZoolServiceHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.decoded.zool.ZoolServiceHub

  • public class ZoolServiceHub
extends java.lang.Object
    This class wraps Zool and interacts with it as a Service announcement portal. Each Application Container that uses a ZoolServiceHub can define a service key for every container with the same service key, each container will be grouped into a list of hosts for that service key. Each host on the Zool Cluster will get a copy of the entire services map. Which is how each host knows about all other services, and their locations inherently.
